data.name: Studio License Subscription
data.detailed_description:
Gravity Sketch is an intuitive 3D creation tool empowering you to unleash your creativity. Replicating the natural experience of creating with your hands, you can now fully express your ideas in real-time, from initial conception, straight into 3D. Create detailed models, scenes and artwork and export them directly into another design tool, CAD software, game engine, or 3D print platform. Gravity Sketch is the tool for the designer who believes that every stroke counts. Be part of the community riding the new wave of 3D creation!

“The holy grail of Gravity Sketch is that we are not aware of the software, we are aware of our work”
- Bruce Beasley

STUDIO Subscription Features:


- Pro Features
- Gravity Sketch Import Plugin for Rhino (BETA and Windows only)
- Studio Workspace Panel (control lighting, reflections, shadows, and color)
- NEW FEATURES HERE

*Commercial use limitations: Small and medium-sized companies (non-enterprise use)
For yearly subscription contact us directly info@graitysketch.com

ENTERPRISE LICENSE

- Contact us directly at licenses@gravitysketch.com

data.short_description: Gravity Sketch is an intuitive 3D creation tool empowering you to unleash your creativity. Replicating the natural experience of creating with your hands, you can now fully express your ideas in real-time, from initial conception, straight into 3D.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater.
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS High Sierra
  • Processor: 3GHz 4 Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vega 56
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

price_overview.recurring_sub_desc: 92,99€ at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at 92,99€.
